features.title: Compose message
features.desc: Using MailBar you can compose new messages, reply or forward to you inbox.

features.title: Filtering
features.desc: You can easily filter list of you emails by mailboxes and unread status.

features.title: Fast search
features.desc: With MailBar you can fast search through bunch of you configured emails by all email data.

features.title: Smartboxes
features.desc: With MailBar you can use any of configured smartboxes and setup on mailbar not only inbox mailboxes.

features.title: Attachments
features.desc: With MailBar you can preview any image attachments, download or open attached files with other formats.

features.title: Signatures
features.desc: MailBar automatically integrate all signatures for any accounts, that configured in Mail.app.

features.title: Shortcuts
features.desc: MailBar has configuraion of shortcuts for faster access to you emails.

features.title: Color flags
features.desc: MailBar has full support of colored flags. You can easily mark you important messages to one of 7 colors.

features.title: Calendar events
features.desc: You can see connected to message calendar events on MailBar single message view.

features.title: Group operations
features.desc: With MailBar you can easily mark as read or junk full conversations.

features.title: Sounds
features.desc: You can easily configure unique sounds for every mailbox in MailBar.

features.title: Retina support
features.desc: MailBar has full support of retina displays.

reviews.name: George Popescu, Softpedia
reviews.body: MailBar is lightweight, user-friendly and unobtrusive utility that makes it easy for your to check and manage your emails with just a couple of mouse clicks

reviews.name: Bohemian Boomer
reviews.body: MailBar, yet another way to help manage email on your Mac without even bothering to switch from what you're doing to check on Mail.

reviews.name: NoodleMac
reviews.body: Finally, something good comes to Email. MailBar a more convenient, faster, easier way to dispose of the latest messages while you’re working from within another app on your Mac.

reviews.name: Tera Talks
reviews.body: MailBar is a clever way to get you through the bulk of incoming email without having to switch to Mail or leave the app you’re using at the moment.

reviews.name: Mac360
reviews.body: MailBar is lightweight, doesn't do much more than give you quick access to your email, just makes it easier to get to the messages that matter.
